name: Spark (GMTK Game Jam 2020)
description:
This is my Entry into the GMTK GameJam 2020

The Theme is Out of Control.

This isn't just any platformer. This is a platformer which constantly cuts you out of the robots power making the robot hard to control as he constantly loses control.

You go on a search to find the girl you have fallen in love with.

This game was made in 17 hours.

I created...

  • The Art Assets
  • The Coding
  • The Music

I Hope you Enjoy it!
